description: System-generated unique identifier for this downtime record.
Identifier linking this downtime entry to the related work order, asset, and procedure context.
Date and time the asset was taken out of service (downtime start).
Code classifying the downtime event (e.g., planned, unplanned, failure type); values require reference mapping—confirm with SME.
Duration of the outage for this event, expressed in hours (decimal).
Free-text notes describing circumstances, cause, impact, or actions taken for the downtime.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this record, regardless of user or process.
Miscellaneous flags or settings associated with this record; likely a bitmask or encoded field—confirm exact usage with SME.
Timestamp of the last modification performed by a user (as opposed to an automated job); may duplicate last-modified audit—confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who created this record.
Timestamp when this record was created by a user.
Identifier of the user who last modified this record.
Timestamp when a user last modified this record.
